website_summaries.verdict: Multiple storage options and colorful prints make this the ultimate crowd pleaser. A great option for the playroom or your child’s bedroom.
pros: Three-tiered design makes it easy to organize books, smaller items, and large toys
Holds a considerable amount without being bulky
Sits low enough to offer easy access for toddlers
Available in popular Disney character options for boys and girls
cons: With only pictures for guidance, assembly can be tricky

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Paw Patrol fan
customer_reviews.text: The product is a really nice addition for my son’s paw patrol themed room. I placed in corner for a “reading” nook. Expectations are meet considering price point. About $15-20 overpriced but again it’s Paw Patrol. Nevertheless, we’re both satisfied and he really loved it. I used the Marshall bubbles toy for estimating size of small shelf on top. The middle “shelf” is fabric and has a slight slant. Also it should be noted the bottom bins will sit on floor. There is no bottom shelf. My size lookout tower and toddler bed pics for size comparison.
customer_reviews.author: BMC

customer_reviews.title: Hardly worth it.
customer_reviews.text: The liner didn’t properly align putting pressure on the screws. The drawers on the bottom just slide on the floor instead of having bars or some form of attached support. Poorly made and came with scratches on the interior panels. If I had nothing but time on my hands I’d take it apart and return it but i don’t and my son was to excited to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Buy this if your kiddo loves Frozen!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this! Like every parent, I’ve been looking for a sturdy, space saving toy and book solution for my girls’ room. They’re obsessed with Frozen 2, and I wasn’t holding my breath on quality, but this thing is so sturdy! It was also very easy to assemble. Bonus that I didn’t think of? All of their toys are organized into character bins. So they know Barbie and doll accessories go in Kristoff and Sven, Anna and Elsa have their Barbies, etc. much easier to get them to clean up now!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Happy  I purchased
customer_reviews.text: I believe this product is for children of at least 2 year's of age but I bought this for my 11 month old. He really like it but he just likes to take the drawers out and carry it around. Hopefully I can teach him how to take care of it. It was very easy to put together and made of sturdy particle boards. The box was very heavy and that was unexpected but then I realized the product is good. It is very spacious and does hold lots of books.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Barreda

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This organizer was easy to put together and made with sturdy materials. I was hesitant to purchase based on the mixed reviews, but I am extremely happy with the purchase. It took me 10 min to put together and it holds a fair amount of books/toys. We mainly have board books and it holds approximately 35. My only concern was tipping, as it doesn't come with an anchor for the wall. We purchased our own and anchored it for our 1 year old. It is the perfect size for a 1-3 year old and we are happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Great for younger kids
customer_reviews.text: This is great for a toddler’s toys. It’s small enough for them to get to everything and you don’t have to worry about a lid closing on their head or hands. I think it could be sturdier, the material the shelves are put together with will not hold up to heavy toys or books. The graphics are fantastic, any child who loves the Paw Patrol will enjoy looking at Marshal and the gang.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan B

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Considering how cheap this was, honestly thought it would last a month! Have had it for 2 years my daughter has climbed all over it etc. Still in her room, great print qaulity of the princess'. Great durability. Looks great also!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I almost grew white hair trying to follow the direcrions, minus well just throw those out . I put it together in about 15 minutes with a 1 and 3 year old next to me It's so cutw, my boys love it and so do I It's the perfect size for both of my boys and it hold a lot of books and toys
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Toy/ book storage
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. It's twice the size of the typical one's you can find to buy. The colors are very vibrant and pretty. Matches perfect with her room. Holds lots of items. Toys, books, ect. Very sturdy, the wood is well made as all the material on this are. Holds up well with the kids.
customer_reviews.author: TLB

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Item had dents and marks. It was a Christmas gift for my daughter the box had looked like it had been retapped but I didn’t notice prior to wrapping it. Once I opened the box you could see the plastic that held all the screw was already open. I still put it all together cause my daughter was so excited to have it it hold a lot of books and toys
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a Cars fan!
customer_reviews.text: It goes great with my son's Lightning McQueen toy box, and he absolutely loves the graphics. It's a really nice looking toy organizer. Perfect size for a toddler, between this and his toy boxes it has more than enough stroage space. I was actually really impressed with how many books it can hold as well. I hope that it holds up well, but thanks to Amazon Warehouse I got a great price on it so I believe we will get our money's worth either way.
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice

customer_reviews.title: Over priced junk, terrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: When assembling this, I couldn’t help realize that I paid $50 for 2 slabs of wood and 4 tubes. I contacted the manufacturer about a missing piece, and they keep replying requesting information I had already sent them multiple times. TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE. Over-priced junk. Pass!
customer_reviews.author: Nef Soto

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my three year old, and not only was it easy to put together, it's very nice quality at well. The bins can be folded if not in use, though I don't know why anyone would not want to use them since they're very high quality and look fantastic. The book sling and the shelf are super useful and allow my son to put away taller toys on display and easily find his books.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Blount

customer_reviews.title: It's small but the perfect size for her
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter for her birthday. It's small but the perfect size for her, I think she just has to many toys which having her birthday didn't help. She's able to pull her toys and books out on her own safely which is what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Its great
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift from my mother-in-law to her granddaughter and we love it. Originally thought that it would hold a lot of her toys but it keeps our living room much cleaner and neater. My daughter especially loves the design and it looks exactly like the picture
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks cute but not durable
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had this together for maybe all of 5 days and this thing ripped already. We don’t have heavy toys in this and my 21 month old didn’t attempt to climb on this. He uses his chair for that. I’ve had these when my older ones were little. I guess they don’t make them like these used to 10 years ago. Disappointed in the quality of the shelves.
customer_reviews.author: LoLo223

customer_reviews.title: Book and Toy Organizer
customer_reviews.text: Product shipped damaged, I gave as a gift without opening first and when recipient tried to call to get replacement part they would not deal with him since he didn't have the credit card it was purchased with. It should not have been needed.
customer_reviews.author: Kim W.

customer_reviews.title: Great value horrible instructions
customer_reviews.text: The instructions were horrible, the pictures and numbers for the parts don’t match which made the assembly extremely hard, normally I can follow the instructions and put things together like this but since it was too confusing I had to get my husband to put it together and he even had a bit of a difficult time in the beginning... other than that it’s a Pretty good value! My 4 year old likes it and it fits perfectly in his room...
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and spacious
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this thing scratches easily and a corner was already a little messed up when I opened the box but my son still loved it and got all excited to to put his toys away with me. However I do wish the bottom was solid so the bottom boxes didn’t have to be on the floor. It would make it much easier for moving It around.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Romero

customer_reviews.title: Has plenty of space keeps things organized.
customer_reviews.text: This toy chest keeps my grandson's toys & books organized. It was simple to put together. I had it about 5 months and it remains sturdy. The colors are bright and he loves the paw patrol design.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of bins
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice set of bins the book section holds a lot more than I expected which is great. The back shelf was a little difficult to do by myself, I managed to get it done but it would be a lot easier if you could have an extra set of hands.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my granddaughter! Product is exactly as described, super cute and holds all her toys. Only concern is It can topple over if your child try’s to use it to pull themselves up. It’s a perfect size!
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but needs more stability
customer_reviews.text: It is a really cute organizer for the minnie mouse lover's, my 2 year old love it. The only thing that I dislike is that it doesn't have much stability, it almost fell on my daughter. Is not made of a heavy material, but for a small kid could be something badly.
customer_reviews.author: cecilia h.

customer_reviews.title: Nice organizer
customer_reviews.text: Very nice organizer, a bit smaller than I thought it would be but worked perfectly. Very easy to put together. There is a typo in the directions but still simple to do.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Taylor

customer_reviews.title: My grandchild wasn't afraid of this item
customer_reviews.text: My youngest granddaughter just loves it. She was so ecstatic, clapping he little hands and jumping all around the toy organizer. So happy for her. Fatima
customer_reviews.author: Fatima

customer_reviews.title: Love this for my son
customer_reviews.text: Works great.. Holds alot of toys an books! My son loves the cars movies so this was a awesome gift for him. He puts his stuff away easily. It was very simple to put together!
customer_reviews.author: LillacMomma

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice.
customer_reviews.text: This is nice looking, but it is not very sturdy. It may hold books in the top, but the can't be too heavy or the rod across will bend.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Whipple

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend for any child under 3 ! Read description!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have read the age requirement for this ... my 1 yr old tries to tip it over ..I put something in front of one of the corners so it won't tip over, but she still rocks it to where it slams against the wall.. she also takes out the cubbies and managed to take the inside out that keeps it popped open ... she almost always does this. This would definitely be better for an older toddler!! It definitely does its job !
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Missing screws
customer_reviews.text: After waiting forever for this item they sent it with the box turn & partially open with all the parts which didn't appear damaged but no screws to put it together. I'm a bit upset about that cuz now I have to wait to put this together for my son room
customer_reviews.author: Storm everlasting

customer_reviews.title: Good idea
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than when I thought it was going to be but I love it and fix all her books in it her toys in it she likes it just her size she can reach everything
customer_reviews.author: Shelly W.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was cute and bout it for my 7 year old and he loves it , it may not be hardcore material but it's good for the price and adds color and imagination to any room .
customer_reviews.author: Lorena R

customer_reviews.title: Super cute organizer!
customer_reviews.text: This toy organizer was just what I was looking for. Easy to put together and seems pretty solid. My 17 month old loves putting his toys in the bins. 👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but cute and effective
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it, it was easily to assemble and it’s very sturdy. I don’t like how it cost so much more than the others because it is a Disney brand but you do get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Karina A.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to put together and just what I thought it was going to be. My 3yo son loves paw patrol and was so excited to see this being placed in his room. It is of decent size and the book holder was my favorite part. It also has a very small shelf behind the book holder, where my son's little model cars can line up on. Great Choice
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, exactly what I needed for my 1yr old, perfect height. Material cracked a bit while putting together and a piece fell over during assembly, breaking off the little nubs
customer_reviews.author: Briana

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love this!
customer_reviews.text: First off- I’m a huge Disney fan and for the price I had to buy this for my daughters growing toy collection! It was easy to put together and that’s coming from the least handy woman on the face of this earth. Also it’s cute and fits most my daughters toys.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Best Disney Frozen 2 And PJ Masks Toy Storage Bin And For Her Books And Toys
customer_reviews.text: My Daughter Love It Good Size For Her She Can Get Her Books And Toys Plays And Help Her Clean Up She Loves It Disney Frozen 2 And I Also Got PJ Mask One I Got Both For Her
customer_reviews.author: Mirabal28

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: You definitely need a second pair of hands to assemble, but it’s stuffy and fun, and my little nephew absolutely loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: LinM

customer_reviews.title: Do not order from this individual
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this in January, set it aside and just opened it to put it together and found out that two of the main pieces were split in half. The box arrived damaged but was hoping what was inside was intact. Very disappointed with this.
customer_reviews.author: natalie sinanian

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: vivid colors, easy to assemble. smaller than i thought, even though i already knew the measurements. not a bad price for something with disney characters on it.
customer_reviews.author: clinton omohundro

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money on this P.O.S Easy to put together but SUPER flimsy. The boxes for the toys are super small. I'd reather put his toys in storage bins then this. If I could give it 0 stars I would.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Belanger

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put together, and the price is very affordable. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Toddler still has a messy room, but there is at least a place where he can put his toys.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Camarena

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than pictures make it look
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute but MUCH smaller than it appears in the pictures. I didn’t really measure and went off of how big it looked in the images. The depth is super small and the top shelf is SO narrow
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Childs Organizer
customer_reviews.text: I thought this piece would be great for my little one as her theme is all Minnie mouse. This was extremely easy to assemble, took me 15 min or less. It has a lot of space for plenty of toys and she enjoys using her organizer to take and put toys away. Love this
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: This was so easy to put together and my son loves it! Fits all of his smaller toys and books!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Look like trash.
customer_reviews.text: Look like trash When I bought things is because I need them not to keep return them your need to do your best before delivered a trash to someone house. Every single part on this thing was broken, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Den

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful !
customer_reviews.text: Me and my husband are so satisfied with this cute Toy organizer.. My 1 year old loves it and is easy for her to get her toys out Thank you for this amazing Disney Princess Toy organizer ...
customer_reviews.author: Vanesa Paredes

customer_reviews.title: Great toy box
customer_reviews.text: The stand itself is good, sturdy; the bins not so much but what can you expect from fabric cubbies? I love it and it makes a decent toy box for my boy
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Perfect size for my son to reach everything. It was easy to assemble. So far looking good.
customer_reviews.author: R.m

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a keeper.
customer_reviews.text: I love this toy box. It was very easy to assemble and took just about twenty minutes to assemble. My daughter loves being able to see all of her toys in the baskets. My only wish, is that there was some bars on the bottom. The bottom baskets just sit on the floor and aren't held up by anything. Other than that, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Cowsie

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy storage!!
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were kinda confusing I had to search it up on youtube. but other than that super cute! holds a lot of small toys.
customer_reviews.author: Haliey

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves his bookcase and can put his toys away easily. Looks nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Mama Bear

customer_reviews.title: Great & helpful product!
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for my 2 year old to display her books & organize her toys. Although it doesn’t fit all of her stuff, it definitely cleaned up the place a lot & it is a great product to have!
customer_reviews.author: urooj haider

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble. Cute graphics. Boxes are collapsible fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking Item but sent DAMAGED!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received this item and the headboard was broken. I am very frustrated by this being that we are COVID 19, and one has to expose themselves to send stuff. I had to use crazy glue to mend it together for me to assemble the product. If not, I would have to send it back. Overall it works. I'm just disappointed I was sent damaged goods. I used the stickers given to try to hide the crack.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Nzegge

customer_reviews.title: This looks great in our Mickey themed play room for the kids
customer_reviews.text: This looks great in our Mickey themed play room for the kids. The bins are pretty good size and keep a lot of the little toys out of sight. The book shelf part holds way more books than I thought, just see my picture. There are at least 30 books of all different sizes. Building this thing was really easy. There were only a handful of screws that needed to be attached to each side and the book part is a fabric that just slides over metal poles.
customer_reviews.author: BBarich

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shelf but hard to put together
customer_reviews.text: Love this shelf but it was a pain to put together. That would be my only complaint. Otherwise it’s sturdy and bright colors and lots of storage space
customer_reviews.author: Laurey Glidden

customer_reviews.title: To small for the price you pay
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok it’s way to small for the price of it and the bottom cubbies just sit on the floor in the pictures it looks like there is a bottom piece there but it’s not if I would have know it was this small I would have picked something else but it will get the job done for now so I guess you can call it a space saver toy box
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Mena

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: My toddler really like this product. It’s easy to keep her toys organized with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ronak Gandhi

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful toy case and display. We really like the top section for books. The only drawback is the flimsy nature of the large boxes on the bottom...they pull back very easily. Overall, good toy box!
customer_reviews.author: Addrienne

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this an an additional toy box. We already have the smaller sized paw patrol organizer but needed more cubes. It has held up nicely and we find it much easier to get our toddler to put his toys back up with this.
customer_reviews.author: Jameeka

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Pretty shelf, but a couple parts hard to assemble on your own.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Combs

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy, nice looking
customer_reviews.text: It was very nice to begin with but, not even 2 months in and it's already a disaster. Ripped in several areas the back is cracking and the bins are folding in. Doesnt hold up well with kids playing
customer_reviews.author: christie

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected, not good quality material.
customer_reviews.text: Was not expecting the small size. Should have got larger size. My 2 year old grandson has broken it. Not good quality. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: sturdy piece
customer_reviews.text: very easy to put together. Not many parts. Sturdy, and good weight to keep from tumbling over
customer_reviews.author: Nesto

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver
customer_reviews.text: Loved it . Assembled it all by myself and I suck at those things . Also put a lot of books on it and it holds well .
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great storage for kids stuff
customer_reviews.text: It is as described, and decent size. The little reusable stickers a) dont last long at all (we bought it for christmas, stickers are all destroyed) and b) may pose a risk to very young kids if swallowed.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe - Faejynx

customer_reviews.title: Its beautiful
customer_reviews.text: My baby loved it. Looks beautiful and comes with huge stickers she enjoyed adding
customer_reviews.author: Cee Rivra

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest organizer ever. Would recommend a million times over.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Gevorkyan

customer_reviews.title: They love it
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons love this cars organizer. They have all of their books and cars in the bins that came with it. They really like it and it helps to keep all their toys off of the floor, also matches everything else in the room. Great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute! Daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I like this a lot, but the instructions manual was ehhhhh. Not very helpful in putting it together. I figured it out on my own without it. The product comes with window clings essentially, which I didn't even know until I open it up. But my girls thought that was a cute touch!
customer_reviews.author: AmberAwesomeSauce

customer_reviews.title: This is ridiculous.
customer_reviews.text: This pisses me off. I was hoping to get something cute and easily organized for my daughter and I wanted to surprise her, but now I can’t since this is broken. Y’all need to check the products before they leave your facility because this is uncalled for. The next one I receive better not be broken.
customer_reviews.author: Justine Autumn St.Clair

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my 16 month old. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 16 month old. I was a bit worried she would climb on it or try to move it around so I anchored it to the wall with brackets. I also didn’t put the boxes in yet because she would just play with it. Otherwise she loves the bookshelf and organizes her books.
customer_reviews.author: MommyBelle

customer_reviews.title: NOT worth the money!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is not worth the money! The paint is chipping off the product and we just took it out of the packaging. Very poor quality for the amount spent on this. You can get a better product at IKEA for less money!!
customer_reviews.author: Tami Biyo

customer_reviews.title: If you Don’t overstuff the bottom bins it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It was perfect size for my 4 year old girl. The only thing I don’t like is if you stuff to many toys in the bottom bins they bow out and can’t be perfectly aligned with the bottom bar so it doesn’t really hide the toys. So.. just don’t overstuff and you’ll love the product.
customer_reviews.author: cheri

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It is small enough not to take up to much space and it is so functional. I love it! My son plays with it everyday and he knows how to put away his toys. I love having a spot for everything and this was a life saver. Ironically it also holds many books!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Lioness

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: It's not as big as I thought it would be. The instructions were not very clear but we figured then out eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Decent product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. It’s smaller than I realized, but it still works. It’s difficult to assemble alone
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Stuerke

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for organizing your little
customer_reviews.text: Very simple to assemble! Product is as described. It’s been in use for 2 months now and seems to be holding up even though it’s bulging with all the toys and books. Would recommend for toddlers and small children because it’s the perfect height and very safe.
customer_reviews.author: FreyjaAesir

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together and very sturdy. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: i spy u spy

customer_reviews.title: Cute and great for price.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and not too hard to put together. One part of the instructions was wrong with the labeled part needed but it was easy to figure out the mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Packaging..
customer_reviews.text: The box was in horrible shape. I had to check if everything was there and wasnt broken. Excited to put together! But disappointed in the way the packaging is because it is a fragile item and the way it is cared for shows how they “care” for their items.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking shelf!
customer_reviews.text: Great shelf! The containers were a bit smaller than I expected but actually hold quite a few toys and books. The graphics are really great and this looks fabulous in my son’s Paw Patrol themed room. He loves it and loves putting his toys away in it, which was the whole point! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda A Gasal

customer_reviews.title: Cute and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Love this for my sons room! Perfect height for him!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Material
customer_reviews.text: For $50+, I’d expect a little bit better quality, not cardboard. I was so excited to put this together for my son because he loves Lightning McQueen and the quality of it was disappointing. Instructions are trash, good thing that have a YouTube tutorial on it
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Loza

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and very cute for any paw patrol lover!
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Product came in good shape, with all the parts
customer_reviews.text: Product came in good shape, with all the parts. But the cloth shelf that holds the middle baskets is very poor quality and the first time my toddler tried climbing on it (as toddlers do) he put his foot right through the cloth! I tried to sew it up but the fabric just kept pulling apart and wouldn’t hold together at all. Now the shelf is useless and won’t hold up the middle baskets. For the price, you would think they would use quality materials that can withstand toddlers.
customer_reviews.author: brittany w.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Best item ever. Colorful and durable. Fits many toys. U will love it
customer_reviews.author: Ewa Flak

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it
customer_reviews.text: Been a couple months now and it’s still holding strong. My son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Paw patrol shelf
customer_reviews.text: When I received item box was damaged and when opened plastic ripped open. The chase side board as in picture damaged. If possible like a full or half refund on item.
customer_reviews.author: christina

customer_reviews.title: Wrong directions
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this item however the directions had wrong information on it. It was telling me to use the wrong screws in the wrong places
customer_reviews.author: LaChelle

customer_reviews.title: Good value, cute toy organizer.
customer_reviews.text: Love this set, it’s cute, and easy to assemble. My son will organize his toys too.
customer_reviews.author: Justin M

customer_reviews.title: Looks good
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, looks like it will hold up good.......time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: It was a Christmas present for my grandson he absolutely loved it.
customer_reviews.text: It was a Christmas present for my grandson he absolutely loved it.
customer_reviews.author: DJCarvelli

customer_reviews.title: Depending on skill you may need two people for assembly
customer_reviews.text: I needed something that would display my toddlers books in an an appealing way and this worked out perfectly. Extra bonus for it being toddler sized and accessible to the little one. I was also pleased with how much storage room the drawers provide. The assembly wasn’t difficult, however I found the top piece to be a bit awkward and benefited from the help of a second person.
customer_reviews.author: iLex

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews, we bought this since out kids are huge frozen fans. This organized feels cheap, materials used are flimsy and the book shelf is very shallow. The only saving grace is that it is easy to assemble. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: RPar

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Got this toybox for my niece and she loves it
customer_reviews.author: kendra

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: She really loves it! She shows it to everyone who visits. It was pretty hard to assemble, mostly because the paint on the wood is super slick.
customer_reviews.author: Danni

customer_reviews.title: Deluxe is misleading.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I gave this 4 stars is because the product does not look "deluxe" at all. The bin in the picture is one of the two "extra large bins" on the bottom. For a deluxe organizer, it is tiny. Other than that, I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Jaseislond Medina

product_meta.title: Delta Children Deluxe Book & Toy Organizer, Disney/Pixar Cars
product_meta.description: Color:Disney/Pixar CarsMake his bedroom or play space extra-special with a little help from Lightning McQueen. Boasting colorful graphics, this Cars Deluxe Book & Toy Organizer from Delta Children features fabric bins and a two-tiered bookrack supported by a sturdy wood frame.
feature_bullets: Made of engineered wood, solid wood and fabric
Meets or exceed all national safety standards and CPSC regulations
